titleStmt.title: A catechisme wherin is contained the true grounds of the articles of the Christian faith, contained in the Lords prayer and the Creed, by way of question and answer betweene Protestant and Papist. Diuided into twenty Saboth exercises, for children to learne the Christian religion.
titleStmt.author: Davis, Francis, fl. 1612.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
